thread.title: Lumiere Film Festival: Martin Scorsese Talks Female-Centric Films, Los Angeles vs. New York
thread.title_full: Lumiere Film Festival: Martin Scorsese Talks Female-Centric Films, Los Angeles vs. New York

title: Lumiere Film Festival: Martin Scorsese Talks Female-Centric Films, Los Angeles vs. New York
text:
Topix › Entertainment › Lumiere Film Festival: Martin Scorses... Lumiere Film Festival: Martin Scorsese Talks Female-Centric Films, Los Angeles vs. New York Next Story Prev Story 13 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
"It's never too late to learn," said the Oscar-winner about working on female-centric projects in the future. After being celebrated at the Lumiere Film Festival in Lyon, the birthplace of cinema, with the Lumiere Award, Martin Scorsese reflected on his career before the festival came to a close. Start the conversation, or Read more at Hollywood Reporter.
